name: Blades Away
description:
Physics based knife throwing with lots of blades to master.

Tips for fastest progress:
⭐ Some blades are easier to use than others
⭐ More challenging blades earn more rewards
⭐ Unlock Skill Shots by achieving medals with high scores
⭐ Use Skill Shots to get the most coins
⭐ Mastery ranks can be skipped by exceeding expectations
⭐ Skipping mastery earns huge payouts
⭐ Blade of the Day unlocks after you own any 5 blades
⭐ Blade of the Day gives you x3 and x5 multipliers
